items.title: If Mom Wants Her Christmas Stocking Filled, Should She Have to Ask?
items.description: A viral Instagram video sparked a debate about emotional labor.

items.title: The Shifts Needed to Make Employees Feel Less Isolated and More Supported in a Digital-First World
items.description: The most connected workforce is also the most isolated.

items.title: Opiate for the Masses: You Can Now Tell Your OpenAI ‘ChatBuddy’ To Be Less Mean To You
items.description: AI is not your friend, and that needs to be made clear before it becomes your enemy

items.title: JetBlue Adds Lounge Access: How it Compares to Competitors
items.description: JetBlue’s new BlueHouse lounge, now open at JFK airport, is designed as a hyper-local respite for the airline’s most loyal travelers.

items.title: Tesla’s ‘Mad Max Mode’ Points to a Big Problem for Self-Driving Cars
items.description: Tesla made Mad Max mode available briefly in 2018 and then reintroduced it in October. It contradicts a core promise of self-driving cars.
